adu aadayamlabhi gramiya niwasalabhin 47,000kata pamana mema naya yojana kramaya yatathe naya pahasukam sandaha awasthawa himiwe.aarthika dushkaratha pawathina niwasa himiyanta pradeshaye widuli adhikariwaraya hamuwi sahana naya mudala wenuwen sakasa athi ayadumpathraya sampurna kara, adala naya mudala laba gatha haki bawa, widulibala ha balashakthi amathya, nithignya pawithra wanniaarachchi mathiniya prakasha karayi.2014 wasara athulatha widuliya nomathi siyalu niwasa sandaha widuliya labadima rajaye apekshawa wi athi athara eya kadinam wadapiliwelak lesa kriyawata nagimata da widulibala ha balashakthi amathyanshaya piyawara gena atha.
